General.Name: Tang Eng Iron Works Co Ltd
General.Description: Tang Eng Iron Works Co., Ltd. produces and sells stainless steel products in Taiwan. It offers steel billets, and hot and cold rolled steel coils. The company also exports its products to Southeast Asia, China, Australia, Japan, the United States, and internationally. Tang Eng Iron Works Co., Ltd. was founded in 1940 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 4, Yen Hai 2nd Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 81260

8.Name: Mr. Shang-Da  Gong
8.Title: Company Sec., Corp. Governance Supervisor & Corp. Governance Officer
